title: The Long Ride
description: Check out the first title in Books for Young Readers' great new series, Pine Hollow, by Bonnie Bryant, author of the popular series, The Saddle Stevie Lake, Lisa Atwood, and Carole Hanson are best friends, and they share everything--including their love of horses.  Now that they are in high school, they are as busy as ever.  Stevie is spending more time on her car than her horse; Lisa is struggling to make her long distance relationship work; and Carole is so busy with her job and the horses she works with that she ignores the people around her!  Then a terrible accident leaves a girl's life in danger.  Will the strain these friends are facing be too much to keep their friendship alive?
author: Bonnie Bryant
